data.text:
Talented-Caring-Sweet: Actress, Singer, Model, Author [lots Of Pics]Welcome to Charlene Choi's 蔡卓妍 Official Thread in Soompi!

Charlene is a really cute actress from Hong Kong. She debuted at the age of 18 in 2000 as a actress, than she debuted as a singer in the most popular Hong Kong band TWINS at 19, and is the youngest female ever to hold a concert in Hong Kong Colisuem. In her short 7 years in the singing industry and 9 years in the movie industry, she has already made over 30 movies, 3 series. Not to mention in the "Twins". Currently working on the movie industry.

Charlene was born in Vancouver, Canada. However her family moved back to Hong Kong a year later. She currently resides in Kowloon. Her height is 5'5".

Charlene studied at a number of different institutions. She attended Marymount Secondary School. In the year 1998, due to her poor academic result and conduct, she was transferred to Rosaryhill School for her studies. In the year 2001, after completed her F.5 studies, she started to become a full-time model in Hong Kong.

In 2001, she was offered to form the Emperor Entertainment Group musical group Twins with Gillian Chung (colloquially known as Gill). Choi since then has been come to known as Charlene, or simply Ah-Sa. In the beginning of twins, there have always been rumors of the two not getting along, mostly because of difference between the two's characters. Gillian was always thought of as the more conservative, and quiet one, while Charlene was the more talkative and outgoing type of character. After 3 or 4 years together, they both had time off and had arranged to go to Taiwan together. After spending so much more stress free time together, they really got to know each other a lot better, and the two have now become best friends. Now after being in the group for over 6 years, twins have announced numerous times that they do not want to be apart, and really enjoy being with each other despite the fact that their management company EEG had suggestions of having the two have solo careers. Twins is now still just as popular as before and have been continuing producing lots of records and movies, and are two of the most successful artists of EEG. Gillian is filming a television series in mainland China, so Charlene has been separated from her for many months now, with many to come, and has been somewhat doing solo acts on TV appearances.

Charlene Choi | Looking Ahead

Charlene Choi | Profile

English name: Charlene Choi Cheuk Yin

Chinese Name: 蔡卓妍

Nickname: Ah Sa, Sa

Languages Spoken: Cantonese, English, Mandarin

Profession: Actress, Singer, Model, Spokesperson, Fashion Designer, Idol to Millions

Birthday: November 22, 1982

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Ancestry: Dongguan, Guangdong

Origin: Hong Kong

Height: 5'5

Weight: 100 lbs

Blood Type: O

Chinese Zodiac: Dog

Zodiac: Scorpio

HK Cantopop Group: Twins with Gillian Chung

Management Label: Emperor Entertainment Group

Years Active: 2001- Present

Fashion Label: SAL

Education: Marymount Secondary School, Rosaryhill School

Favorite Singers: Robbie Williams, TLC, Aaron Kwok, Andy Lau

Favorite Food: Chocolate, Ice Cream, Rice, Pizza

Least Favorite Food: Onions & Lotus Seeds

Favorite Sports: Rugby & Swimming

Favorite Athletes: Zidane (France Football), Ronaldo (Brazil)

Favorite Colors: Green, Red, & Yellow

Favorite Movie: Somewhere in Times

Favorite Animal: Dog

Favorite Seasons: Summer & Winter

Favorite Cartoon: Hello Kitty

Favorite Country: Japan

Favorite Book: "The Da Vinci Code"

Family status: Parents Divorced, Father (Hong Kong Sheng Industrial Wind Entertainment Company Executive)

Fun Facts:

- Charlene states her most recommended Hong Kong tourist attraction as being the airport.

- Charlene's first date was at the age of 16.

- Charlene has only dated 3 men in her life.

- Charlene is the God mother of Lin Xiaofeng's son

- While filming "Simply Actors," Charlene took Jim Chim Sui-Man (Jim Sir) as her mentor

special thanks to Sunny aka machupicchu for helping me compile parts of Charlene's profile

Charlene Choi | Quick Facts Interview

SA: Art & English

SA: Math

Q4: MOST TIRING REGULATION AT SCHOOL?

SA: Attending lessons plans

Q5: WHAT STUDIES DID YOU PARTICIPATE MOST IN THE ACADEMIC SOCIETY?

SA: Art, Drama, Music, Choir...all good!

SA: Don't want to go back to the matter.

Q17: PLEASE DESCRIBE THE FIRST LOVE SUBJECT?

SA: Silly

SA: Marry Me...

SA: A Bracelet

SA: When a good friend betrays you

Q22: HOW MANY LOVE LETTERS HAVE YOU RECEIVED?

SA: Many

Q25: PLEASE ARRANGE LOVE, FAMILY, FRIEND, AND ENTERPRISE IN ORDER.

SA: Don't know because everything is important.

Q28: WHEN YOUR HEART IS BROKEN, HOW DO YOU GET PAST IT?

SA: Singing

Q29: HOW LONG HAS YOUR HEART EVER BEEN BROKEN FOR?

SA: Don't know

Q30: WHAT BAD HABIT DOES YOUR FORMER LOVER HAVE?

SA: Being messy

Q34: WHAT OCCUPATION WOULD YOU CHOOSE IF YOU DIDN'T ENTER THE ET BUSINESS

SA: Designing

Q36: MOST WANTED REWARD?

SA: A Long Vacation

Q37: WHO IN THE ET CIRCLE IS YOUR BEST FRIEND?

SA: Gillian Chung

Q42: RECENTLY, WHAT WAS THE REASON FOR YOU CRYING?

SA: The FANS

Q47: WHICH FRIEND DO YOU WANT TO MEET AGAIN WHO YOU LOST CONTACT WITH?

SA: Bobo Chan, she used to live in my building

Q48: WHAT HISTORICAL PERSON DO YOU WANT TO BECOME?

SA: Princess Diana

Q48: WHICH TELEVISON ACTRESS DO YOU WANT TO BECOME?

SA: Julia Roberts

Q51:WHICH ENTERTAINER, IF POSSIBLE, WOULD YOU SELECT AS AN ELDER SISTER?

SA: Gillian Chung
